product.name: Madison Park Queen Duvet Cover Set Floral Chenille Tufted Cotton Duvet Cover for Queen Size Bed, Soft & Lightweight Queen Bedding Cover with Shams, Veronica, Full/Queen Grey/White 3 Piece
product.description: Complete your bedroom decor with the Madison Park Pansy 3 Piece Tufted Chenille Floral Duvet Cover Set. The shabby chic duvet cover features white cotton tufted chenille floral pattern on a warm grey background that creates a lovely contrast. The 2 matching shams mirror the design of the duvet cover to complete the farmhouse aesthetic. Machine washable for easy care, this tufted chenille duvet cover set offers a soft shabby chic look to elevate your bedroom decor. Button closures help secure a comforter insert within the duvet cover and inside ties in the corners help prevent it from shifting (insert is NOT included). Due to the nature of the chenille fabric, some shedding will occur naturally in the first 3-4 washes. Items in the set may come in a rolled or compressed packaging, which will need to be fluffed up or steam ironed before use to remove wrinkles.
product.bullet_points:
• Chenille
• Shabby Chic Bedding Cover Set – Elevate your cozy comfort with this ultra-soft cotton tufted floral duvet cover set. The delightful floral tufting adds texture and an elegant touch, perfect for a country cottage update
• All Season Duvet Cover Set – Enjoy the perfect balance of fuzzy warmth and softness with this fluffy cotton tufted duvet cover. Crafted from naturally breathable cotton with soft chenille tufting offers fuzzy warm & comfort through every season
• Easy Add-On Duvet Cover – Effortlessly refresh your bedding with this naturally soft, breathable cotton duvet cover set, designed to enhance comfort and coziness. Featuring a button closure and 4 inner corner ties, it keeps your comforter neatly in place
• Bedding Set includes: duvet cover set - 1 Comforter: 90"W X 92"L, 2 Standard Shams: 20"W X 26"L. Chenille fabric will naturally shed from the tufted areas in the first 3-4 washes. Use a static roller to remove lint (see care label)
• DURABLE & EASY CARE: Our cotton duvet cover set offers durability to withstand daily wear and tear. Simply machine wash cold. Gently and separately. Do not bleach, Tumble dry low. Iron on medium temperature if needed
